synopsis.text: Year's end, 2000. The illustrious Dr. Tenma's mansion prepares to host a New Year's Eve bash, gathering the iconic creations of the eternally youthful manga artist, Tezuka Osamu. However, the festivities take a mysterious turn when Osamu inexplicably vanishes from his room, hinting at a possible abduction. As the clock ticks down to the new millennium, Osamu's most beloved characters embark on a thrilling quest to unravel the enigma behind his disappearance and ensure his safe return before the remaining guests arrive. This suspenseful adventure culminates in a heartwarming tribute to the extraordinary man who brought these unforgettable characters to life.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
